Australians are tipped to spend a record amount of money at this year’s Boxing Day sales, however coronavirus restrictions have made for a very different in-store experience.

While shoppers encounter socially distances queues, online purchases have increased…

articles.title: Mi Notebook Pro Geekbench listings with Intel Tiger Lake-H 35 W and AMD Cezanne Ryzen 5 5600H indicate a renewed focus on single-core performance - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: Several Mi Notebook Pro listing have popped-up on Geekbench sporting both Tiger Lake-H and AMD Cezanne processors. Alongside the Intel Core i7-11370H and Core i5-11300H variants, which are 35 W Tiger Lake-H CPUs, a few listings of the Mi Notebook Pro powered …
